entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:51 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -36.4°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
